class.name: InteractorList
class.description: Instance of List<T> for Interactor types

class.name: InteractorIterator
class.description: Instance of ListIterator<T> for Interactor types

class.name: Interactor
class.short: Base class for Interacting physics types
class.description: Interactor forms the base class of Body and Shape as the two types of objects which act as interacting objects when it comes to such things as Callbacks and InteractionGroup's

detail.description: Unique per-Interactor identifier (Thus the same set of id's is shared between all Shapes and Bodies)
Interactor callback type for callback event listeners
If this Interactor is actually a Shape, then this is a typed self-reference to avoid run-time casting
If this Interactor is actually a Body, then this is a typed self-reference to avoid run-time casting

method.name: isShape
method.description: Check if Interactor is a Shape

detail.description: Returns true if this Interactor is a Shape avoiding the need for run-time type checks

method.name: isBody
method.description: Check if Interactor is a Body

detail.description: Returns true if this Interactor is a Body avoiding the need for run-time type checks
